channel.title: Comments on: Another Sunday Morning Practice

item.title: By: Photos From Sunday Morning Practice » Software, Photo » Russell Heimlich
item.dc:creator: Photos From Sunday Morning Practice » Software, Photo » Russell Heimlich
item.description: [...] past Sunday I joined the boys and girls FCA flag football teams for their weekly practice. I was taking pictures, they were working out. This marked the second outing with my new sports lens and I had been [...]
item.content:encoded: […] past Sunday I joined the boys and girls FCA flag football teams for their weekly practice. I was taking pictures, they were working out. This marked the second outing with my new sports lens and I had been […]

item.title: By: John F Croston III
item.dc:creator: John F Croston III
item.description:
Nice photo.
To do sorts pictures you need to use the longest and fastest lens you have to get into the action. Make it feel like your right there in the huddle so to speak.
item.content:encoded:
Nice photo.

To do sorts pictures you need to use the longest and fastest lens you have to get into the action. Make it feel like your right there in the huddle so to speak.
